original_text: And the king said to Haman, “The money is given to you, the people also, to do with them as it seems good to you.”
korean_text: 이르되 그 은을 네게 주고 그 백성도 그리하노니 너의 소견에 좋을 대로 행하라 하더라

sentences.original_text: And the king said to Haman,
The money is given to you,
to do with them as it seems good to you.”
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 좋게 보이는 대로 그들에게 행하라
